abstract: Jury in Boston Marathon bombing trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev hears firsthand accounts from police officers and neighbors who say he ran over his brother Tamerland with sport utility vehicle while fleeing scene in Watertown, Mass, after shootout.
lead_paragraph: A jury heard firsthand accounts from police officers and neighbors in the trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who the prosecutors said had run over his brother, Tamerlan, while fleeing.

headline.main: Police Recall Dodging as Marathon Bombing Suspect Ran Over Brother
headline.print_headline: Police Recall Dodging Bomb Suspect as He Ran Over His Brother

snippet: A jury heard firsthand accounts from police officers and neighbors in the trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who the prosecutors said had run over his brother, Tamerlan, while fleeing.
